title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform next to draped table in front of painted backdrop showing fort scene] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform next to draped table in front of painted backdrop showing fort scene] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 11.6 x 10.4 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Frame:Thermoplastic scroll frame. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Backdrops--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
